articles.author: Agency Staff
articles.title: One man's quest to grant an AI a patent gathers momentum - TechCentral
articles.description: Recent decisions from South Africa and Australia that an artificial intelligence machine can be listed as inventor on a patent is putting greater pressure on the US and Europe to resolve debates over what it means to be an inventor.
articles.content:
Ryan Abbotts eight-year quest to put man and machine on a near-equal footing under international patent law is finally seeing positive results.
Recent decisions from South Africa and Australia that … [+6031 chars]

articles.content: SINGAPORE - Singapore's plan to pilot leisure travel for those vaccinated against Covid-19 - starting with Germany - has given cheer to travel-starved residents who have been kept at home by the coro… [+11598 chars]

articles.author: Ajeet Kumar
articles.title: Australian scientists discover over 400-year-old coral reef in Queensland - Republic World
articles.description: The scientists said that the coral reef is about 421-438 years old, which means it is older than the European expedition and the foundation of Australia.
articles.content: A team of scientists in Australia's Queensland discovered a 10.5 metres wide, 5.3 metres tall coral reef on 20 August, Friday. According to a report by the Guardian, the coral reef, which was found a… [+2315 chars]
